name: BHOR - earth's mightiest builder
description:
a Shmup game by Team NiN9

Working as a builder on a construction site, Bhor finds himself in the midst of an alien invasion one day. 

He must use his unique skills and godly powers to escape with his life...

Controls: left click shoot, right click throw, WASD movement, R to reload

Sounds: freesound.org, pixabay.com, sfxr.me
